name: terminologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the special words or expressions used in a particular subject or activity: It is arguable that this article is not even terminologically correct. See
terminology
More examplesFewer examplesTerminologically, carcinoma in situ is defined as an epithelial malignant tumor in which tumor cells are confined to the epithelium, not invading the basement membrane.Saussure conflated the two terminologically. Terminologically it is reminiscent of Bakhtin's distinction of primary and secondary speech genres.
